edu.rit.pj2.tracker

Class TaskSpecInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.tracker.TaskSpecInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class TaskSpecInfo
extends Object
implements Streamable
    Class TaskSpecInfo is a record of information about a TaskSpec in a Rule in a Job. It carries the information a Tracker needs to schedule a Task as part of a Job.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String[] jvmFlags
      Array of JVM flags for the task's backend process.
      Object moreData
      Additional data, or null if none.
      NodeProperties node
      Task node requirements.

      Task ID.
